messages.title: VOTE FOR WHAT YOU BELIEVE IN

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Creating jobs that pay at least the living wage by investing in renewable energy and public services.
Bring rail and energy companies back into public hands. Ensure the NHS is properly funded, and education is free for all.
End austerity and restore the public sector, creating jobs that pay at least a living wage.
Make votes matter with a fairer voting system.
Oppose fracking, support clean energy, promote local shops and farming, and provide affordable housing.
Stay in the EU to fix its shortcomings.

mentions.candidate: Richard Wise is a Green Party candidate with a strong track record in the community and local business.

issues.brexitEurope: Stay in the EU to fix its shortcomings.
issues.economy: End austerity and restore the public sector.
issues.environment: Investing in renewable energy...oppose fracking, support clean energy.
issues.governance: Make votes matter with a fairer voting system.
issues.health: Ensure the NHS is properly funded.

endorsements.endorsement: Richard Wise is a great choice for Hitchin and Harpenden: he’ll be a strong green voice for you in parliament.

quotes.text: Richard Wise is a great choice for Hitchin and Harpenden: he’ll be a strong green voice for you in parliament.

images.caption: Photo of Caroline Lucas and Natalie Bennett endorsing Richard Wise

leaflet.additionalNotes: ABOUT THIS PUBLICATION: This leaflet was printed from an ecologically managed forest. Please recycle.
